articles.author: Hyonhee Shin
articles.title: As food crisis threatens, humanitarian aid for North Korea grinds to a halt
articles.description: Humanitarian aid for North Korea has nearly ground to a halt this year as the United States steps up the enforcement of sanctions, despite warnings of an potential food crisis and improving relations with Pyongyang, aid groups say.

articles.author: William James
articles.title: Britain presses for more EU sanctions against Russia
articles.description: Britain on Tuesday will call for the European Union to increase sanctions against Russia, saying the bloc had to stand "shoulder to shoulder" with the United States, which hit Moscow with new economic curbs this month.

articles.title: Zimbabwe says 'hostility of the West' putting off renewed investment
articles.description: Western hostility towards Zimbabwe is deterring investment, the presidency spokesman said on Tuesday, comments in sharp contrast with President Emmerson Mnangagwa's previous efforts to woo Western governments.

articles.title: Microsoft Uncovers More Russian Hacking Ahead of Midterms
